events.name: Goldengrass
events.description: Four days of bluegrass music and craft beer.

events.name: Town Park Pre-TBF
events.description: Pre-festival gathering at Town Park before the main Telluride Bluegrass Festival.

events.name: Telluride Bluegrass Festival
events.description: Nestled in the rugged San Juan Mountains of Southwestern Colorado, the Telluride Bluegrass Festival is not only an iconic representation of all kinds of bluegrass music, but a destination for music lovers from all walks of life.

events.name: High Mountain Hay Fever
events.description: Great Music, Great Place, Great Cause

events.name: BoogieOnTheHill
events.description: BoogieOnTheHill is a small and intimate camping gathering held on 35 private acres outside of Lyons, CO this July 18th & 19th. We offer a lot of fun for an affordable price.

events.name: Rockygrass Academy
events.description: RockyGrass Academy is an intensive bluegrass music camp offering workshops and instruction.

events.name: Rockygrass
events.description: Located in Lyons, Colorado, RockyGrass is traditional bluegrass at its finest. Red rock cliffs and Cottonwoods peer down over the property as festivarians pick in the campground and along the St. Vrain River.

events.name: The Song School
events.description: Imagine a place where you can explore and grow every aspect of your song- writing and creativity:  melody, lyrics, performance, voice, story, guitar techniquesâ€¦ a place where you receive professional feedback, music business and recording tips.

events.name: SnowyGrass
events.description: 10th Annual SnowyGrass. Panoramic Views, Camping and Jamming Festival. Dog-friendly

events.name: McAwesome Ranch
events.description: As we approach the 6th annual installment of The Colorado Bluegrass Festival, it is clear that this event is unlike any other night of music in Colorado.

events.name: WanderFest
events.description: Dates have been set for WanderFest 2025! We will have 3 days of live music from Thursday, 9/11 - Saturday, 9/13. For more information visit our website.

events.name: Pickin' In The Rockies
events.description: Pickin' In The Rockies is a festival in western Colorado that is providing a whoopin', hollerin', toe tappin', hand clappin' good time for the entire family.

events.name: Buffalo
events.description: Save the date and join us for the second annual Buffalo Bluegrass & Picking Festival! Featuring live music from some great local artists, daily workshops, and a band scramble.
